talk.author: did:plc:rfxty7n2kupi3xq4y46n5ikk
talk.utter: Don’t believe your lying eyes. Trump’s mask is off and his dystopian fascist reality is taking shape. There are disaffected Magalites getting disillusioned every passing day. Help them onward to join the pro-Democracy coalition and turn it into a supermajority-this is how you turn the tides blue. 💙🌊

talk.author: did:plc:rfxty7n2kupi3xq4y46n5ikk
talk.utter: Ask not what your country can do for you -ask what you can do for your country. When “We the People” stand United,  under the hallowed banners of liberty, equality and justice for all and fight “BIGLY”, we will not only prevail,  but we will WIN to let freedom ring loud, clear and blue. LFG! 💙💙🌊🌊

talk.author: did:plc:rfxty7n2kupi3xq4y46n5ikk
talk.utter: It’s FAFO time for them- they are starting to feel distraught, insecure and panicked-this is the opportune time to “demagafy.” This way when Mango Mussolini tries to sing his pied-piper song again,(he will) they will not only be immune/but will vociferously reject his mesmerizing beckoning call.

talk.author: did:plc:rfxty7n2kupi3xq4y46n5ikk
talk.utter: Just roll up the “truth” newspapers NOW and smack them around mercilessly and we won’t go back!! We have until 1/20/2025” where “We the People” have immense power to change the course of our collective manifest destinies. When we fight “BIGLY” we will not only prevail, but we will win!

talk.author: did:plc:rfxty7n2kupi3xq4y46n5ikk
talk.utter: “To secure ourselves against defeat lies in our own hands, but the opportunity of defeating the enemy is provided by the enemy himself“ - Sun Tzu, The Art of War

talk.author: did:plc:rfxty7n2kupi3xq4y46n5ikk
talk.utter: Strong 🦻HEARtS💙💙 Clear eyes👀. It ain’t over until the fat Orange convict singsings on 1/20/2025! Fight strategically, fight smart, do not obey in advance-Divide-conquer and convert the MA.GA. When we fight we win!!!!

talk.author: did:plc:pntylnv3fyu3vh67kjuh4v3a
talk.utter: I appreciate your earnestness but you may want to reconsider that route, as it could lead to you getting flagged/labelled or suspended for bot-like behavior. Try personalizing your messages, it's worth it. 💙

talk.author: did:plc:rfxty7n2kupi3xq4y46n5ikk
talk.utter: Fascism only works if people forget they have the power and when people lose their sense of self-agency-this is the necessary and crucial grassroot ground game we need to apply at this critical juncture now- thanks for the advice though, I will keep that in mind. We are all in this together,
